title: Heera Kundan Bridal Haaram with Tanzanite Drops - Chowkdi Design
materials: Rubies. Hyderabadi Kundan Setting. Meticulously crafted with the traditional Chowkdi design for lasting beauty.
features: Elaborate Chowkdi (geometric square) patterned design, intricately set with uncut diamonds in the classic Kundan style. Features tanzanite bead drops for a touch of modern elegance. Emeralds are meticulously placed to enhance the overall design, with rubies giving the jewel an amazing look.
occasions: Ideal for a grand Indian wedding
or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. A perfect heirloom piece for future generations.
description: This Bridal Haaram is a stunning fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The Chowkdi pattern is considered highly auspicious, while the combination of uncut diamonds, tanzanite, emeralds, and rubies symbolizes prosperity, peace, and love. The exquisite Hyderabadi Kundan setting ensures the diamonds sparkle with unmatched brilliance. A true investment in timeless elegance.
